text: warasulan ila bani is'raila anni qad ji'tukum biayatin min rabbikum anni akhluqu lakum mina l-tini kahayati l-tayri fa-anfukhu fihi fayakunu tayran bi-idh'ni l-lahi wa-ub'ri-u l-akmaha wal-abrasa wa-uh'yi l-mawta bi-idh'ni l-lahi wa-unabbi-ukum bima takuluna wama taddakhiruna fi buyutikum inna fi dhalika laayatan lakum in kuntum mu'minina
